com.hazelcast.spi.impl.operationservice

Interface TargetAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheMergeOperation, CachePutAllOperation, FinalizeJoinOp, MapReplicationOperation, MapReplicationStateHolder, MigrationOperation, OnJoinOp, PartitionReplicaSyncResponse, PostJoinMapOperation, ReplicaFragmentMigrationState

    public interface TargetAware
    An Operation that has to be aware of the remote target member address before being serialized and sent over the network can implement TargetAware interface so the target Address will be injected to it.

    The target Address injection only happens when the Operation is invoked using the invocation system. When a TargetAware operation is explicitly sent to a remote target or executed locally, setTarget(Address) should be explicitly called before the operation is sent or executed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setTarget(Address address)
      Provides the designated target member address to which the operation will be sent.

    • Method Detail

      • setTarget

        void setTarget(Address address)
        Provides the designated target member address to which the operation will be sent.
        • This method is invoked on the implementing object before the operation is serialized and sent over the network
        • When an operation is retried, the target may be re-evaluated (eg a partition operation may target a different member after a topology change). setTarget will be invoked on each retry with the current target member's Address as argument
        • When an operation is executed on the local member, the local member's address is provided as target address
        Parameters:
        address - target member's address
